scripts.pngquant: for x in `find . -name 'rollup.config.js' -maxdepth 2 ! -path './alien.js*' -exec dirname {} \;`; do echo "$x" && cd "$x" && rm -rf dist/assets/images && cp -r src/images dist/assets/ && find dist/assets/images -name '**.png' -exec pngquant --strip --ext=.png --force {} \; && cd ..; done
scripts.pngquant-flat: for x in `find . -name 'rollup.config.js' -maxdepth 2 ! -path './alien.js*' -exec dirname {} \;`; do echo "$x" && cd "$x" && rm -f dist/assets/*.png && cp src/images/*.png dist/assets/ && find dist/assets -name '*.png' -exec pngquant --strip --ext=.png --force {} \; && cd ..; done
